info.title: My API
info.description: This project database using TPT (Table-per-Type) design, because of the complexity of the data structure, from the User has been extended down to use syquelize as a communication with postgreSql.

tags.name: User
tags.description: 1.hasOne(Admin),hasMany(Merchant) 2.id, name, email, password, phoneNumber, address, role

tags.name: Merchant
tags.description: 1.belongsto(User),hasMany(Menu),hasMany(ProductOption) 2.id, user_id, business_name, description, feature, merchant_logo, location

tags.name: Product
tags.description: 1.belongsto(Menu), hasMany(ProductImg), belongsToMany(ProductCategory), belongsToMany(ProductOption) 2.id, name, description, price, menu_id

tags.name: ProductOption
tags.description: Middle table 1.belongsto(Product), belongsTo(option), belongsTo(Merchant), belongsTo() 2.id, product_id, option_id, is_custom, merchant_id

tags.name: Option
tags.description: 1.belongstoMany(ProductOption), hasMany(OptionValue), belongsToMany(Category), belongsTo(Category) 2.id, name, category_id, type

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: role Can be filled in(customer, merchant, admin)

get.summary: Get All Merchant by User Id

post.summary: create admin,set user role to admin(Originally for customer),enter user_id
post.description: before create you need to login by admin user

get.summary: get single admin data(return user date),enter user_id

delete.summary: delete admin and set user role to customer(Originally for admin),enter user_id

get.summary: Find all the menus of a merchant, Enter merchant_id

delete.summary: Delete menu,Enter menu_id,All data related to the product will be deleted.

get.summary: Query all products containing menu_id,Enter menu_id
Check all the menus and products of a particular merchant. Enter merchant_id
Photo of the Product taken with the product_id,Enter Product_id
